name: Kevin Marco Tanaya
text:
Content Warning: Sexual Violence and Trauma
.
.
.
.
Looking for a way to be creative and share your work? The STOP Campaign is creating another zine (yay)! The vision for our zine is an exploration of change. Through the theme of change, we hope our readers go on a journey from the stories of survivors to the positive and negative roads of recovery and the future of the STOP Campaign.
We are looking for a variety of submissions from memoirs, opinion pieces, poetry to comics, satire and opinion. We want this zine to promote positive change within the ANU and provide survivors of sexual violence with a voice. You are never alone, speak up and seek support!
‚ú®‚ú®The deadline to submit is Monday 23rd September (Week 8 ANU timetable) so get those submissions in! ‚ú®‚ú®

name: Cut Nuke
text:
REGISTER NOW
2019 Indonesia Update
From stagnation to regression? Indonesian democracy after twenty years
An updated program is now available on the website.
This conference examines the quality of Indonesian democracy. The contributors will identify, assess and debate the signs of democratic backsliding across a range of political and institutional contexts. They will do so with a view not just to assessing Indonesia‚Äôs democratic evolution over time, but also to situating Indonesia in the context of a global democratic recession.
This conference is convened by Eve Warburton (ANU & NUS) and Thomas Power (ANU).

name: ANU Indonesian Students' Association
text:
Looking for a multicultural, Asia-Pacific volunteering experience?
ANUISA is looking for volunteers (casts, performers, productions etc.) for our biggest event of the year, PASPAMPRES: Pasar, Penampilan dan Presentasi Budaya! (Open to everyone)
What? An Indonesian drama and cultural performance with the theme of ‚ÄòThe Struggle for Love‚Äô, combined with a traditional folk market which provides free Indonesian food üò±üò±
Positions in the Production, Marketing, Logistics, Costumes, etc. are available!
If you‚Äôre interested, please sign up through: bit.ly/VolunteerPASPAMPRES üòä

Summary: KBRI akan mengadakan acara perpisahan untuk para staff yang berakhir masa penugasannya pada tanggal 14 November, (Rabu minggu depan). Untuk kalian yang sudah selesai ujian, dateng yuk ke acara ini!
This event is not only great because of the free food that will be provided, but also to get to know the Indonesian diplomat community in Canberra!
Untuk informasi lebih lanjut, simak undangan dari KBRI berikut!
Kepada Yth:
Seluruh Masyarakat Indonesia di Canberra dan Sekitarnya
Perihal: Undangan Perpisahan Pejabat KBRI Canberra
Dengan berakhirnya masa penugasan Pejabat KBRI Canberra sebagai berikut:
1. Bapak Iwan Freddy Hari Susanto - Koordinator Fungsi Pensosbud
2. Bapak Hari Mulyanto - Atase Darat/Militer
3. Bapak Riva Yanto ‚Äì Atase Udara
bersama ini dengan hormat kami mengundang kehadiran Bapak/Ibu beserta keluarga dalam acara perpisahan Pejabat KBRI Canberra yang akan diselenggarakan pada:
Hari / Tanggal : Rabu, 14 November 2018
Waktu : Pukul 18.30 - selesai
Tempat : Balai Kartini - KBRI Canberra
8 Darwin Avenue Yarralumla, ACT 2600.
Pakaian : Batik/Bebas Rapih
Demikian disampaikan, atas perhatian dan kehadiran Bapak/Ibu dan keluarga kami ucapkan terima kasih.
Canberra, 7 November 2018
Fungsi Pensosbud KBRI Canberra

Halo semua,
Kalau kalian tertarik mempelajari tarian-tarian tradisional Indonesia, yuk gabung ke kelas yang dibawakan langsung oleh penari-penari yang tampil di Pasar senggol pelajar kemarin!
Indonesian dance classes akan mulai lagi hari Kamis, 11 October, jam 6.30-8.30pm. Kalau ada yg tertarik, baik laki-laki ataupun perempuan, silahkan datang. Harganya $7 per kelas dan diadakan setiap hari Kamis. Tempatnya di Playing Field Studio, 2 Kingsley Street, New Acton, di sebrang Toad Hall.
Informasi lebih lanjut dapat menghubungi Ifa di 0458 98 1235

text:
Come and join this event guys!
Ini kesempatan yang bagus banget buat kamu untuk memperluas jaringan koneksi antar mahasiswa dan para profesional di Canberra.
What's more awesome is that PPIA members get a $10 DISCOUNT! The code for this is BalaiKartini.
See you there!!!

Hello everyone. In regards to the recent terrorist attacks in Surabaya and further threats of terrorism in Jakarta, East Java, and East Java, the Indonesian community in Canberra has decided to take action and evaluate the situation. Please read the message below.
Sahabat-sahabat warga Indonesia di Canberra,
Kejadian demi kejadian aksi terorisme di tanah air telah mengoyak rasa keadilan dan perikemanusiaan kita, khususnya perilaku instrumentalisasi perempuan & anak-anak tak berdosa sebagai alat.
Untuk menyatakan sikap atas peristiwa tersebut dan menggelorakan semangat #IndonesiaTidakTakut sebagai dukungan bagi pemerintah (dan seluruh masyarakat) dalam melawan terorisme dan radikalisme di Indonesia, kami atas nama sebagian warga Indonesia di Canberra mengajak Bapak/Ibu/Sdr/i untuk melakukan aksi #IndonesiaTidakTakut pada:
Selasa, 15 Mei 2018;
5-6.30pm
Queen Elizabeth Terrace, Canberra
Kegiatan:
- diskusi/refleksi
- pembacaan pernyataan sikap
- doa bersama
Pernyataan sikap yang akan dibacakan kurang lebih berisi:
1. Mengutuk aksi kekerasan
2. Mendukung langkah cepat dan tegas pemerintah
3. Himbauan pada semua pihak untuk berkontribusi mencegah peristiwa yang sama terulang ke depan
Ditunggu kehadirannya pada acara diatas, demi Indonesia yang aman dan damai üáÆüá©
Catatan:
- peserta yang berkenan memegang lilin dipersilahkan membawa lilin, yang tidak berkenan tidak perlu memegang atau membawa lilin
- pakaian hangat
- akan ada penggalangan dana bagi yang berkenan menyumbang
- membawa tulisan pernyataan sikap utk dipegang, seperti: #IndonesiaTidakTakut #KamiBersamaPemerintah
#TolakTerorisme dll
We hope to see you there.

name: ANU Indonesian Students' Association
text:
Halo Pelajar Indonesia di ANU!
Ingin ketahui lebih dalam tentang riset-riset mahasiswa kita? Apakah dampak riset-riset ini ke Indonesia dan Dunia?
Indonesia Roundtable discussion tahun ini bertema: "Impactful Research". Disini akan dibahas riset-riset mahasiswa Indonesia di Canberra - dari Ekonomi, Politik, Budaya dan Sains. Jangan sampai terlewat!

name: ANU Indonesian Students' Association
text:
Selamat siang para pelajar Indonesia di Canberra!
We have exciting news. ANU ISA members get a $20 off of programmes conducted by Blended Learning International, including the upcoming "Communication Workshop". Good communication skills are necessary for networking and in getting a career. For more information, please contact info@blendedlearning.edu.au
:)

name: ANU Indonesian Students' Association
text:
Selamat pagi para pelajar Indonesia di Canberra!
The Canberra Multicultural Women's Forum - CMWF is conducting a consultation session to provide the ACT Government with advice about best practice methods for consulting with women from multicultural backgrounds. As part of these consultations, they want to speak with women from the Indonesian community living in Canberra.
The consultation will take place on the 7th of April from 10am-12pm in a location in the city. If you are an Indonesian woman and are interested, please e-mail to ppia.anu@gmail.com or anu@ppia-australia.org as soon as possible.
Thank you!

name: Razi Sugianto
text:
Interested in photography? Keen to know how to capture instagrammable picture?
PPIA-ACT proudly presents "The Clubs" on photography!
Come and join us to have fun on a Saturday night! Let's take a picture and learn about photography with our special guests. Do not have a camera? Just bring your phone and you're good to go!
The Clubs is a program established by PPIA ACT to accommodate Indonesian students' interest in their hobbies.
Brace yourself for upcoming activities which involve cooking, fashion and make-up! See you there!
#theclubs #capturecanberra

Ada kesempatan menarik untuk kalian yang sedang studi di CBE:

AccountantChange Quarter 1 2018 is now open for registration. We are thrilled to bring new accounting software training, cashflow modelling, and project cost management workshops to your Students members.
7 hours of CPD will be awarded to each attendee for their CPA programs. It is highly relevant to their Accounting/Finance career development.
Use the promotion code "AC Q1 2018" free entry tickets. For more information check out the eventbrite link below:

name: ANU Indonesian Students' Association
text:
Belajar di Australian National University?
Ini adalah Facebook Group resmi dari Perhimpunan Pelajar Indonesia di Australian National University (PPIA ANU / ANUISA).
Grup ini ditujukan untuk sarana pembagian informasi antara komunitas pelajar Indonesia di ANU. Anda dipersilakan memposting informasi seperti pertanyaan, aktivitas-aktivitas, penjualan barang ataupun hal-hal lain yang bersangkut paut dengan komunitas pelajar Indonesia di ANU.
Bergabunglah dengan group ini untuk mendapatkan informasi terkini dari PPIA ANU dan komunitas-komunitas lainnya.
Ingin menyampaikan pesan secara anonim? Klik link berikut:
goo.gl/forms/yj6SwH7tOCVPxg432
Grup ini di moderasi dengan ringan. Post yang tidak layak akan dihapus.
Bila ada saran, keluhan atau pujian dapat disampaikan ke Admin grup.
